subject: Ethics
title: Voice Cloning Fraud
description: Learn Voice Cloning Fraud in one minute.

hook.text: A mother got a call from her daughter sobbing, begging for ransom money. The daughter was safe at home.

buildup.text: AI voice cloning can replicate anyone's voice from just a few seconds of audio found online.

discovery.text: Scammers clone voices from social media posts, voicemails, and YouTube videos to impersonate loved ones.

twist.text: The cloned voice carries emotion‚Äîfear, urgency, tears. Our brains trust familiar voices over logic.

climax.text: The FBI reported a surge in AI voice scams. Most victims send money before realizing it's fake.

punchline.text: Three seconds of your voice is all a scammer needs.

quiz.question: How much audio does AI typically need to clone someone's voice?
options: At least thirty minutes of clear audio
Just a few seconds from social media or voicemail
